text: Andrei Nikolaevich Tupolev (Russian: Андрей Николаевич Туполев; 10 November 1888 - 23 December 1972) was a Soviet aircraft designer and founder of Tupolev. ==Other websites== * GlobalSecurity.org Category:1888 births Category:1977 deaths Category:Russian inventors Category:Soviet engineers
title: Andrei Tupolev
